description: This file defines the IButler interface and nested INotification structure within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace. It specifies virtual methods for managing IValuePoint elements and notifications related to changes, with external dependencies like Core::IUnknown, IValuePoint, and other interfaces.
external_methods: uint32_t IButler::Link(const string& path, const uint32_t id)
uint32_t IButler::Move(const string& path, const string& newName)

classes.name: IButler
classes.description: An interface for a component managing IValuePoint elements, allowing registration for notifications and access to elements by name or ID.

classes.name: IButler::INotification
classes.description: Nested interface for receiving notifications about added, removed, updated, or metadata-changed IValuePoints.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification sink for changes on IValuePoints.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered notification sink.

methods.name: Element (by name)
methods.description: Retrieves an IValuePoint element by its string name.

methods.name: Element (by id)
methods.description: Retrieves an IValuePoint element by its numerical ID.

methods.name: Source
methods.description: Returns the source string for a given module.

methods.name: Branch
methods.description: Returns a branch ID for a given path.

methods.name: Link
methods.description: Links a path to a specific ID.

methods.name: Move
methods.description: Renames a path with a new name.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes an element at the specified path.

methods.name: Orphans
methods.description: Returns an iterator over orphaned IValuePoints for a module.

calls: uint32_t IButler::Link(const string& path, const uint32_t id)
uint32_t IButler::Move(const string& path, const string& newName)

ctags.name: IButler
ctags.pattern: /^		struct EXTERNAL IButler : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^			struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
